subject: Sexual Health
title: Consent Is Ongoing
description: Learn Consent Is Ongoing in one minute.

hook.text: Saying yes once does not mean yes forever. Consent can be withdrawn at any moment without explanation.

buildup.text: A person may agree to one activity and not another, or change their mind partway through.

discovery.text: Ongoing consent means continuously checking in and respecting shifts in comfort throughout an encounter.

twist.text: Past consent does not imply future consent. Being in a relationship does not waive the right to refuse.

climax.text: Healthy intimacy treats consent as a continuous process, not a one-time permission granted and forgotten.

punchline.text: Consent has no expiration date. Check in always.

quiz.question: Can consent be withdrawn after it has been given?
